name: BeamBlocked
description:
This game was developed in 3 hours for the theme "Blocked"

You have to reach the goal, using a beam of light to power switches along the way.

The light is blocked, but the light also blocks you, so you have to open and close the switches to keep moving your path forward while also furthering the light's path.

Standard UE5 movement controls, usually WASD on your keyboard, plus E to interact with switches.

Alt+F4 on windows to quit, or on Linux...whatever Linux does.
